short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances thesession.org with tools to organise the tunes you're learning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Adds a 'Practice' item to the menu
- Removes pagination from the sets page
- For each set adds 'nailed it!' and 'needs work' to rate how well you last played the tune
- Also has a 'pin to top'  button for sets you particularly want to focus on
- All the above buttons are added to each individual set's page too
- Sets are ordered based on when and how well they were last played
